comment.summary: Get the value of a command line argument by name from an array of arguments.

comment.raw:
/**
 * Converts an array of args to a Map of key-value pairs. - Arguments starting with -- support spaces and `=` as a separator, e.g. `--name=John` or `--name John` - Arguments starting with - support k/v with spaces, e.g. `-n John` or boolean flags, e.g. `-n` - Arguments without a leading - or -- are treated as positional arguments and ignored.
 *
 * @param args - The array of arguments to convert.
 *
 * @param coerce - Whether to coerce numbers and booleans, or leave them as strings. Defaults to true.
 */
comment.summary:
Converts an array of args to a Map of key-value pairs.
- Arguments starting with -- support spaces and `=` as a separator, e.g. `--name=John` or `--name John`
- Arguments starting with - support k/v with spaces, e.g. `-n John` or boolean flags, e.g. `-n`
- Arguments without a leading - or -- are treated as positional arguments and ignored.

params.name: args
params.description: The array of arguments to convert.

params.name: coerce
params.description: Whether to coerce numbers and booleans, or leave them as strings.  Defaults to true.
